document.full_text: the chinese government said on thursday detained artist and activist ai weiwei was being investigated for "suspected economic crimes," while his family said he was the innocent victim of a political witchhunt.
document.title: chinese artist-activist ai "suspected" of economic crimes
lines_and_colors: the chinese government said on thursday detained artist and activist ai weiwei was being investigated for "suspected economic crimes," while his family said he was the innocent victim of a political witchhunt.
